thread.title: Jessica
thread.title_full: Costa Rican Vacations reviewed by Jessica

author: Jessica
title: Jessica
text: We had never been to Costa Rica before and wanted to experience jungle and beach in our 8 day trip. Tara listened to what I wanted including what excursions I thought we might do and put together an itinerary that wasn't over whelming but included everything I mentioned we would like to do. The hotel in La Fortuna she booked for us was mind blowing. When the staff showed us our room I thought they had the wrong couple lol. Every driver they set up to take us to each location and excursion was on time and spoke good to very good English. Everyone was basically so nice and accommodating.
